description: Randomly increases/ decreases chance-to-hit with all attacks in combat.
Each rank in Gambler increases/ decreases Total Hit by 5%.
Randomly increases/ decreases damage-to-inflict with all attacks in combat.
Each rank in Gambler increases/ decreases Damage by 5%.
Allows for healing other party members in combat.
Also possible to use herbs to double the healing effect.
Increases the chance to successfully flee combat.
Decreases the attention your character draws from enemies in combat.
Allows the possibility to pick locks on treasure chests.
Increases chance-to-hit with weapons FROM BEHIND in hand-to-hand combat.
Increases damage-to-inflict with weapons FROM BEHIND in hand-to-hand combat.
Allows the possibility to play and sing inspirationally in combat,
increasing your party's chance-to-hit
and decreasing the enemy's chance-to-hit.
Allows the possibility of scoring critical hits with weapons in combat.
Each rank in Warrior increases the probability of this by 4%.
Allows the possibility to learn and cast magical spells in combat.
Each rank in Wizard increases the chance to successfully cast a spell by 10%.
Each rank in Wizard increases the spell range by 1 step.
Allows the possibility of scoring critical hits with magic in combat.
Each rank in Wizard increases the probability of this by 1%.
